QuestData.Title: A Pumpkin-y Perfume
QuestData.Description: I heard a rumor around the market that Gina Mudclaw loves the smell of pumpkin blossoms. Maybe if I grow some pumpkins in my farm, she might come and visit a little more often.$b$bCould you plant a pumpkin for me?
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant a Mogu Pumpkin in Sunsong Ranch. You can purchase seeds from Merchant Greenfield in the Halfhill Market.
